title: AI Investment Surge To Accelerate In 2026, Offsetting Tariff Impact On US Economy: Report
description: Artificial intelligence-related investments are set to accelerate sharply in 2026 as companies expand spending to keep pace with the fast-growing AI revolution, according to a report.

title: What to know about Trump’s executive order to curtail state AI regulations
description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday pressuring states not to regulate artificial intelligence, even as some in Congress also consider…
content:
President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday pressuring states not to regulate artificial intelligence, even as some in Congress also consider whether to temporarily block states from regulating AI.

title: AI Stocks Get Pummeled as Oracle Delay Adds to Broadcom Concerns
description: The shares of companies exposed to artificial intelligence infrastructure came in for a beating after a report about Oracle Corp. data center delays added fuel to a selloff already underway following disappointing earnings results from chipmaker Broadcom Inc.

title: Trump signs executive order to block state AI regulations
description: President Donald Trump signed an executive order Thursday aimed at blocking states from crafting their own regulations for artificial intelligence, saying the burgeoning industry is at risk of being stifled by a patchwork of onerous rules while in a battle with Chinese competitors for supremacy.
content:
By JONATHAN J. COOPER

title: ‘Use of artificial intelligence benefits Chartered Accountants’
description: Use of artificial intelligence is only increasing opportunities for chartered accountants, said G. Ramaswamy, former president of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India
content:
Use of artificial intelligence is only increasing opportunities for chartered accountants, said G. Ramaswamy, former president of the Institute of Chartered Accountants of India (ICAI).

title: The defiant dash - Emily Dickinson’s lasting mark
description: Emily Dickinson’s most enduring legacy may be a punctuation mark, one that continues to interrupt sentences, editors, and now artificial intelligence.
content: It is tempting to treat the dash as a quirk of Dickinson’s temperament, something like her preference for white clothing or a reluctance to leave the house. Yet in Inflections of the Pen: Dash and Voice in Emily Dickinson, Paul Crumbley makes clear t... [2715 chars]

title: Families Look For Xmas AI-ssistant
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is becoming the ultimate Christmas Assistant, from carol playlist generation to suggesting Xmas décor themes
content: Ain’t kidding! Families are using AI to plan décor themes, colour palettes, tablescapes, gift wrapping, and even carol playlists. Christmas décor used to begin with a dusty box, a tangle of fairy lights, and a prayer that last year’s star still worke... [6261 chars]

title: Tumbling tech stocks drag Wall Street from its all-time highs
description: More drops for superstars that had earlier soared in Wall Street’s frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology are dragging the U.S. stock market lower
content:
NEW YORK (AP) — More drops for superstars that had earlier soared in Wall Street's frenzy around artificial-intelligence technology are dragging the U.S. stock market off their records on Friday.

title: Mass General Brigham launches AI company to enhance clinical trial matching
description: Mass General Brigham is announcing the spinout of AIwithCare, a company founded by researchers from the health system who developed an artificial intelligence (AI) screening tool that significantly outperformed manual screening for determining a patient's eligibility and enrolling them in a clinical trial.
